017package com.github.siroshun09.mccommand.common.sender;
018
019import com.github.siroshun09.mcmessage.MessageReceiver;
020import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
021
022import java.util.UUID;
023
024/**
025 * Interface that wraps a CommandSender that is different on different platforms.
026 */
027public interface Sender extends MessageReceiver {
028
029    /**
030     * Gets the {@link UUID} of the command sender.
031     * <p>
032     * If it is internal sender, returns {@link ConsoleSender#CONSOLE_UUID}.
033     *
034     * @return sender's {@link UUID}.
035     */
036    @NotNull
037    UUID getUUID();
038
039    /**
040     * Gets the name of the command sender.
041     * <p>
042     * If it is internal sender, returns {@link ConsoleSender#CONSOLE_NAME}.
043     *
044     * @return sender's name.
045     */
046    @NotNull
047    String getName();
048
049    /**
050     * Send a message.
051     * <p>
052     * This method does not colorize.
053     *
054     * @param message message to send.
055     */
056    void sendMessage(@NotNull String message);
057
058    /**
059     * Checks if the {@link Sender} has the requested permission.
060     *
061     * @param perm a permission.
062     * @return {@code true} if the sender have permission, {@code false} otherwise
063     */
064    boolean hasPermission(@NotNull String perm);
065
066    /**
067     * Checks if the sender is online.
068     *
069     * @return {@code true} if the sender is online, {@code false} otherwise.
070     */
071    boolean isOnline();
072
073    /**
074     * Checks if the sender is console.
075     *
076     * @return {@code true} if the sender is console, {@code false} otherwise.
077     */
078    default boolean isConsole() {
079        return getUUID().equals(ConsoleSender.CONSOLE_UUID);
080    }
081}
